name: July
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
"Control your July window air conditioner with your voice using Amazon Alexa.

Connect your July A/C to Amazon Alexa in a few easy steps:

(1) Download the July app in the Apple App Store or Google Play store. 

(2) Connect your July A/C to the app.

(3) Search for the July skill within your Alexa app

(4) Enable the July skill

Once you're done, control July with the following phrases:

""Alexa, turn July on.""
""Alexa, turn July off.""
""Alexa, what temperature is July set to?""
""Alexa, make it cooler.""
""Alexa, make it warmer.""
""Alexa, set July to 21 degrees.""
""Alexa, set July to cool.""
""Alexa, set July to auto.""
